analysis.movement_data.MovementData¶

class analysis.movement_data.MovementData(trial_name: str, trial_number: int, trial_time: float, x: float, y: float, rotation: float)¶

Bases: object

Methods

from_str

Create a MovementData object from a string representation.

get_vector

Get the x, y coordinate vector of the movement.
static from_str(s: str = '') → Optional[MovementData]¶

Create a MovementData object from a string representation.

Parameters:

s – The string representation of the MovementData object.

Returns:

A MovementData object if the string can be parsed, otherwise None.

Return type:

Optional[MovementData]

get_vector() → ndarray¶

Get the x, y coordinate vector of the movement.

Returns:

A numpy array containing the x, y coordinates.

Return type:

np.ndarray
